RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WARHORSE WEST broke in front, set a pressured pace through the turn, shook clear entering the stretch and won as much the best under a strong hand ride. ATILANO never far back, swung wide, rallied in the six path through the stretch and got up for second. AURA OF GOLD stalked the pace and went evenly. TWELVE MINUS ONE failed to menace. ELUSIVE QUESTION pressured the winner along the inside through the turn and weakened late. STREET TRAFFIC trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Atilano
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide, rallied 6parth, up place

ENTRY.NAME: Warhorse West
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pressured pace, drew off, much the best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 22400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 25 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 25 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DR. ZARNETT allowed to settle in the five path, responded under right handed urging entering the stretch, rallied four wide and was along in time. OHIO MUNNY sprinted to the lead before a quarter, set a pressured pace for a half, shook clear in upper stretch, maintained control past the sixteenth pole then couldn't handle the winner. PRIVATE DRIVE pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. KID RUSSELL well placed, moved up three wide on the turn then failed to sustain that bid. RIDING IN THE WIND failed to menace. ROSCO P. COLTRANE was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Munny
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, edged clear lane, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Dr. Zarnett
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, closed willingly, 4 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Kid Russell
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, failed to sustain bid,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 26400. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DANZING CHICK matched stride for the lead two wide through the turn, shook clear in upper stretch and prevailed under mild urging. SISTER CODE allowed to settle, found her best stride late in the five path and finished second best. JACK'S YACHT QUEEN stalked the early pace, offered a mild bid in the six path into the stretch then was outfinished. FULL TIME STRUTIN failed to menace. CAJUN HEIR battled with the winner along the inside through the turn then weakened. TOP HAT TIGRESS trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Code
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, best stride late 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Danzing Chick
ENTRY.OWNER: DaCosta Jason and Brown John E
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, drew clear, mild urging

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 79. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER, OPTIONAL OR OHIO BRED. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 25 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since Februar y 25 Allowed 4 lbs. Maiden, Claiming, Starter, Optional, or Ohio Bred (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOMUCHSUGAR never far back, swung wide, rallied under left handed urging in the seven path and was along in time. FLOWZANO pressed the pace four then three wide and finished clear for second. CANDLELIGHT HOURS was bumped at the start, prompted the pace two wide until deep stretch then was outfinished. MYRRH away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch, drifted to the five path and weakened late. DONYA'S MAGIC vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch and faded late. GOLDEN NOLE broke outward bumping CANDELIGHT HOURS, dropped back to trail, pulled up in deep stretch and was walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Donya's Magic
ENTRY.OWNER: Staley Terry and Lugovich Charles F
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, inside, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Myrrh
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace late stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Somuchsugar
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, swung wide, rallied left handed urging,in time 7p

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Sheltowee Farm, Michael E. Evans II & Travis A. Evans

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Nole
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke outward, bumped start, trailed, pulled up late,walked off

ENTRY.NAME: Candlelight Hours
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 90. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 25 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 25 Allo wed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RIVERBOAT GAMBLER never far back, closed willingly four wide through the stretch under right handed urging, made the lead late and finished full of under to win going away. AMIGO'S AFFAIR broke in front, dueled for the lead two wide into the stretch, gained the advantage then was no match for the winner. TRAGICALLY QUEWICK bumped at the start and had a mild late rally in the middle of the racetrack. SHADOW TRACER stalked the pace form the three path, offered a mild bid into the stretch then faded late. MAKING ME CRAZY bumped at the start and was no threat. MON CAMO matched strides for the lead along the rail into the turn, checked nearing the quarter pole, remained a sharp threat until deep stretch then weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Camo
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, checked nearing 1/4 pole, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Riverboat Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, closed willingly, 4 wide, full of run, going away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Jennifer Kaak & Thoroughbreds By Design, LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Tracer
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3path, middle move, faded late

ENTRY.NAME: Tragically Quewick
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, mild rally late mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Amigo's Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dueled 2w, led, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 50. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FAST AS FAST CAN B broke alertly then brushed with EL CONDOR CAZA at the start, quickly opened a daylight lead, widened into the stretch under right then left handed urging and prevailed under strong handling. TIER ONE allowed to settle, late determinedly in the two then three paths through deep stretch and finished clear for second. RAY'S EMPIRE well placed, closed a gap late three wide. GOOD MUSIC was bounced around between horses at the start, settled mid pack and closed ground late four wide. MAN'S CHOICE also bumped at the start, chased the winner two wide until deep stretch then was outfinished. SYNERGISTIC failed to menace. LEWIS AND CLARK was no threat. PAYMASTER GENERAL was bounced around between horses at the start, squeezed then failed to reach contention. SHOWTIME BOY chased the inner along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. EL CONDOR CAZA bumped at the start and was no factor. JOSH'N bumped at the start and had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Tier One
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed to settle, late rally 2-3paths, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Ray's Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, closed gap late 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Paymaster General
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W

ENTRY.NAME: Good Music
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, middle of pack, late gain, 4 wide,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Daniel J. Yates & Patricia J. Yates

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 72. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 25 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 25 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less No t Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS BETTY hesitated then veered in at the start, closed willingly in the three path to make the lead past the furlong maker and edged away under strong handling. ALWAYS MISCHIEVOUS broke in front, set the pace until mid stretch then couldn't handle the winner. WICKED WONDER never far back, finished with good courage in the five path. TWILIGHT VISION pressured the winner from the inside into the turn then weakened int he stretch. LADY GIULIANA was hustled from the gate to prompted the early pace between rivals, checked at the seven sixteenths pole and lost momentum. SEACHROME trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: hesitated, veered in start, closed willingly 3path, hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Giuliana
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, checked between horses 7/16pole, lost momentum

ENTRY.NAME: Always Mischievous
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace mid stretch, no match for winner,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 60. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HERE'S MY NUMBER was in tight soon after the start, allowed to settle, raced under strong restraint through the turn, swung out to the seven path, closed with a burst of speed under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. MY PINK BUNNY TALE pressed the pace three wide into the stretch, made the lead late then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. SUGAR LOVES IT never far back, finished with good courage three wide while in the six path. DOMINIQUE'S NIGHT had a mild rally late in the seven path. STEALTH MODE stalked the pace two wide and went evenly. DOMINUS O'S ME offered a mild bid along the inside into the stretch then leveled off. VILLAGE CAT rushed to the lead soon after the start, set the pace until deep stretch then weakened. OUTPOST GIRL had brief speed. DEE'S KY WILDCAT was outrun. OH EYE SEE forwardly placed three wide, was through after a half. LIVIE ANNE had good early speed four wide and faltered in the stretch. JUPITER ECLIPSE was never a threat/

ENTRY.NAME: Stealth Mode
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Dominus O's Me
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia

ENTRY.NAME: Here's My Number
ENTRY.OWNER: Yates Patricia J and Yates Daniel J
ENTRY.COMMENT: in tight start, swung wide, closed fast 7path, up in final stride

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Daniel J. Yates & Patricia J. Yates

ENTRY.NAME: My Pink Bunny Tale
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, led late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Village Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace late stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Outpost Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: JK Stable LLC and Barker Scott W

ENTRY.NAME: Oh Eye See
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, 3 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Livie Anne
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, 4 wide, faltered lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Loves It
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, 3 wide, 6path
